ygData.subject: Re: Jewelery Roller coaster
ygData.msgSnippet: ... WIS is also for a last chance at success. Is it WIS that helps you regain concentration when casting a spell after getting hit? Azboklin the enchanter ...
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Hapke, Matthew" <mahapke@...>
>
>WIS is mana for Clerics. Last night I wasn't eve trying and I sold 12
>pair of WIS rings, and 8pair of earings. I also sold two more masks!
>Man, those clerics love their wisdom hehe
>
>> -----Original Message-----
>> From: Jason Cent [SMTP:jcent@...]
>> From: Jason Cent <jcent@...>
>>
>> So we know that CHA effects vending prices and spell resists and
>> Charm duration....and that INT gives mana.......what does WIS effect?
>>
>> Thanks.
>> Fistle

WIS is also for a last chance at success.
Is it WIS that helps you regain concentration when casting a spell after
getting hit?

Azboklin the enchanter
